setting.location: Stone courtyard of Jerusalem palace complex
setting.weather: Bright desert sunlight with clear sky

characters.appearance: Roman man, 40s, clean-shaven, weathered face, average height, stern expression
characters.clothing: White Roman toga with purple stripe, leather sandals, gold ring
characters.position: Standing on raised stone platform overlooking courtyard
characters.action: Gesturing with authority toward guards and looking down at prisoner

characters.appearance: Young man, early 30s, long hair, beard, thin build, calm demeanor
characters.clothing: Simple white robe, worn and dusty, rope belt, bare feet
characters.position: Standing in center of courtyard between guards
characters.action: Standing perfectly still, looking directly at Roman official with serene expression

characters.appearance: Two Roman soldiers, late 20s, muscular builds, alert postures
characters.clothing: Leather armor, metal helmets, short swords at sides, red military cloaks
characters.position: Flanking the prisoner on either side
characters.action: Standing at attention while maintaining watchful guard positions

scene.mainElements: Ancient stone courtyard with raised platform, limestone columns, stone steps
scene.details: Rough-hewn limestone walls and flooring, ornate Roman columns with carved capitals, stone steps leading to platform, morning shadows cast by columns across courtyard, metal rings embedded in walls for prisoners
scene.background: Jerusalem cityscape visible beyond courtyard walls, distant hills and desert landscape under bright sky
scene.atmosphere: Formal judicial proceeding in ancient setting, tension between power and calm dignity, bright desert sunlight creating strong contrasts, no text or letters visible

composition.cameraAngle: Wide shot capturing full courtyard scene from ground level
composition.focus: The contrast between Roman authority on platform and humble prisoner below
composition.depth: Foreground: stone courtyard floor and prisoner; middle ground: raised platform with Roman official; background: limestone columns and distant Jerusalem

colorPalette.usageNotes: Soft, dreamy colors that blend into each other

rendering.detailLevel: selective focus, some areas sharp, others dissolving
